6.63: Rescaled base  strength and gain from 16 + 1.5 to 20 + 1.2. Increased  Mana Void radius from 275 to 325.
6.60: Reduced base  strength and gain from 21 + 1.9 to 16 + 1.5.  Mana Void now deals damage to all units within 275 radius around the target (damage still based on the primary target only).
6.65: Increased  Mana Break mana burn per hit from 16/32/48/64 to 28/40/52/64. Reduced  Mana Void cooldown from 120/100/80 to 70 on each level.
6.00: Reduced base armor from 0 to -1 (total armor is now 2.08).  Spell Shield now reduces attack speed by 20 on each level, instead of attack damage by 50%/40%/30%/20%.  Mana Void now applies the stun instantly, instead of using a projectile (damage already is instant).
6.68: Increased  Spell Shield magic resistance bonus from 10%/20%/30%/40% to 15%/25%/35%/45%.
6.04: Restored the projectile on  Mana Void stun (unknown speed, can be disjointed, damage still instant).
6.07: Reduced base attack time from 1.7 to 1.45.
6.50: Reduced  Mana Void manacost from 175/225/275 to 125/200/275.
6.35: Increased base armor from -1 to 0 (total armor is now 3.08).
6.02: Fixed  Spell Shield reducing attack speed by 80, instead of 20.
6.72d: Undid melee hero collision change from 6.72c
6.55: Increased base  strength from 16 to 19. Increased  intelligence gain from 1.5 to 1.8. Increased base attack damage from 24-28 to 27-31 (total attack damage is now 49-53).
6.53: Reduced  Mana Void cooldown from 120 on each level to 120/100/80.
6.52: Mana Void now applies the stun instantly, instead of using a projectile (damage already is instant).
6.72c: Melee hero collision size now reduced from 24 to 12.
6.75: Reduced movement speed from 320 to 315. Legs decreased from 2/2/2/2 to 1/1.5/1.8/1.9. Increased  Blink cast time from 0.33 to 0.4.
6.70: Increased  Spell Shield magic resistance bonus from 15%/25%/35%/45%. 26%/34%/42%/50%.
6.73: Increased base attack time from 1.35 to 1.45. Reduced base armor from 0 to -1 (total armor is now 2.08).
6.72: Reduced base attack time from 1.45 to 1.35. Increased attack range from 100 to 128.
6.80: Mana Void Increased radius from 325 to 450. Added a radius indicator to the mouse cursor.
6.81: Increased  Mana Void radius from 450 to 500.
6.84: Mana Void no longer ignores ancient creeps, Roshan and creep-heroes.
